interface.name: znet_tapesoftware_dwl_wm_v1
interface.description: Clients can use this protcol to receive updates of the window manager state (active tags, active layout, and focused window). Clients can also control this state.

description.summary: gets a dwl monitor from an output
announces the presence of a tag
announces the presence of a layout

entry.name: urgent
entry.summary: tag has at least one urgent client

description.summary: updates the selected state of the monitor
updates the state of one tag

arg.name: focused_client
arg.summary: -1 if there is no focused client

description.summary: sent after all other events have been sent. allows for atomic updates.
